#### Us

Our values and our history behind every project.

#### Headquarters

Would you like to visit our company? We look forward to seeing you in Vittorio
Veneto.

#### Work with us

We are one big family at Lainox. Would you like to join us? Send your CV and
we’ll get in touch.

#### Sustainability

We design for the planet

#### Contact

Get in touch with us

#### Restaurants

Find out why it is convenient to use combi ovens in your restaurant and how to
save energy

#### Pastry shops and Bakeries

Find out about our range of professional convection ovens for pastry shops and
bakeries.

#### Bistros & Bars

Professional ovens for bistros, bars and cafés

#### Supermarkets

Professional ovens for delicatessens and ovens for roasting chickens

#### Catering & Large Businesses

Heavy-duty industrial ovens for professional catering

#### Enthusiasts & Gourmets

Professional ovens for home kitchens

#### Naboo 5.0

The evolution of a species

#### Aroma Naboo 5.0

For bread and pastry everyday

#### Sapiens boosted

More powerful, more efficient, even smaller

#### Puff

Easy Baking

#### Oracle

Speed in its purest form

#### Neo 24 hours

Enter the era of Combifreeze

#### Zoom

Focus on the organization of your kitchen

#### Naboo@home

A professional oven in your kitchen at home

#### Special offers

Discover all the special offers

#### Nabook

Choose the recipes you want, create your menu and shopping list. Enter the
world of Nabook.

#### Configurator

Choose the product based on your requirements, configure it by selecting the
accessories available and request a customised offer.Choose the product based
on your needs, configure it by selecting the accessories available and request
a customised offer

#### Business Service

Get in touch with our dedicated service

#### Service & Planner

Is it your job to tell your customers about our company every day? Login here
to make the most of the tools we have designed with you in mind.

#### Help Centre

Do you have a problem or you don’t know how to get the most out of our
product?

#### Testimonials

The satisfaction of those who have chosen to change their culinary style with
Lainox.

#### Demo

Are you a chef who likes a challenge? Find the Lainox Kitchen Triathlon
nearest you and showcase your culinary style.

#### Fairs and Events

There’s no-one like us! Come and find out with your own eyes at a trade fair

#### News

Stay up to date with Lainox activities.

#### Lainox YouTube Channel

A channel dedicated entirely to you who have chosen the best.

#### Newsletter

Have you been won over by our products? Let yourself be inspired by our
stories too and subscribe to our newsletter.

#### Work with us

We are one big family at Lainox. Would you like to join us? Send a CV and
we’ll get in touch.

#### Expert tips

Follow our tips to always choose the best for your kitchen

## Professional ovens for real cooks and great chefs

Lainox, your partner for the professional kitchen, we take care of you from
small restaurants to Michelin-star chefs.

Find out more

## Ovens for pastry shops and bakeries

Find out about our range of professional convection ovens for pastry shops and
bakeries.

Find out more

## Professional ovens for bistros and bars

We transform your small spaces into big kitchens

Find out more

## Professional ovens for delicatessens

We replace your rotisserie and increase your profitability

Find out more

## Heavy-duty industrial ovens for collective catering

Lainox, your ideal professional catering partner, choose the oven best suited
to your needs

Find out more

## Cook like a master chef

A professional oven in your home kitchen

Find out more

## Combi and accelerated cooking ovens, multi-purpose blast chillers

Discover all the Lainox solutions

.

## Why Lainox

####

Our ingredients are behind every project

#### Experience

At twenty we felt grown up, and at forty our desire to grow and surprise has
not stopped yet

#### Avant-garde

Every day we choose to be first. We are first to go against the current, and
the first to innovate.

#### Quality

For our products, we are not satisfied with just doing well, we want to be the
best.

#### Wide-ranging

Whether you are a chef or a large chain, our products have been designed with
you in mind.

#### Sustainability

Environmental sustainability is a question of DNA throughout the entire
product life cycle.

Find out more about Lainox

## Other chefs have already tried it

####

So, why are you waiting to step up your quality?

### “During the à la carte restaurant service, we rely on the Multilevel
system which helps us achieve precision in cooking and speed in service which
is fundamental for this type of catering.„

##### Ennio Grava - "Ai Cadelach" Restaurant - Revine Lago (TV)

## Bring magic into the kitchen

####

The magic wand to manage your work

## Nabook

### Your kitchen at your fingertips… wherever you are

Your complete and totally free virtual assistant, to help you organise and
manage your kitchen. Even if you aren’t a Lainox customer yet.

Create, organise and save your recipes

Calculate the food cost of your recipes

Organise your shopping intelligently

Configure all your kitchen devices remotely

Are you ready to start?  
Discover Nabook

Are you ready to start? Discover Nabook Collega i tuoi Naboo e Neo Collega il
tuo Oracle
